summary: Complete tweak of Skyrim graphics, with ENB 0.111, Realistic colors and real nights, SSAO, Depth of Field with the goal of having a realistic, immersive Skyrim experience.
descriptionHtml:
IF U LIKE MY JOB PLEASE ENDORSE!

[IMG]http://i1250.photobucket.com/albums/hh523/laxxino/Project%20ARISE/Untitled-1-1.jpg[/IMG]

Project Arise is a complete tweak to the graphic of Skyrim, with the use of last ENB 0.111 and RCRN HDR 3.0, gives your visuale an incredible boost, pointing at beaty and realism, without hitting your FPS much. (can play 60fps on most decent machines).

Features:
- Very dark, realistic, nights
- Realistic lightsources
- Realistic weather effect, such sunny days, foggy days/nights, real dawns and sunset, rains/snow.
- Dark, involving dungeons
- Realistic lighting inside houses/taverns
- Realistc seasons
- Post process injectors built in (that makes this mod incompatible with FXAA post process injector), for an incredibly realistic night effects (from RCRN)
- Dynamic Depth Of Field
- Better Dynamic snow (from opticshooter) compatibily

[IMG]http://i1250.photobucket.com/albums/hh523/laxxino/Project%20ARISE/Screenshot80675.jpg[/IMG]

**************************************************************************************************************************************


[IMG]http://i1250.photobucket.com/albums/hh523/laxxino/Project%20ARISE/instinscr.jpg[/IMG]

to use this mod u will have to uninstall following mods:

- any mods who tweak ambient fog, exterior fog or volumetric fog, like revamped exterior fog or remove ambient interior fog
- any mods who tweak lights like realistic lighting
- any mods who tweak saturation or colors
- FXAA post process injector
- if u were using the greenwater fix, remove it, this version has no greenwater bug.


INSTALLATION

1) install RCRN 3.0 taken from this link [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1875]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1875[/url]
1.1) when prompted install RCRN in your Skyrim root (where the file TESV.EXE is located)
1.2) when prompted install PURE version
1.3) when prompted click yes at FXAA (at the end of RCRN installation)

2) Extract the zipped archive (arise.zip) in your Skyrim root (where the file TESV.EXE is located), overwrite when asked

3) Download ENBSeries 0.111 kage, wrapper version from [url=http://enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.htm]http://enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.htm[/url] just copy the d3d9.dll into Skyrim root (where the file TESV.EXE is located)

4) Run Skyrim launcher to auto reconfigure graphic detail

if u haven\'t a good machine, set antialiasing at 2x and shadows to medium

[IMG]http://i1250.photobucket.com/albums/hh523/laxxino/Project%20ARISE/Screenshot16855.jpg[/IMG]


MODS WHO WORKS AWESOME WITH ARISE

**Better Dynamic Snow from opticshooter [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10383]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10383[/url]
**Static meshes improvement mod - SMIM from Brumbek [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8655]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8655[/url]
**Skyrim Flora Overhaul from vurt [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=141]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=141[/url]
author: Enhok
